explanation: [0-0] In a living room, three young people are standing. On the left is a woman wearing a white top and black pants. In the middle is a man wearing a black and blue vertical striped long-sleeved shirt, black pants, and white socks. On the right is a man wearing a black top, black jeans, and white socks. The woman in white raises her left hand with her palm facing down and extends it forward. The man in the black and blue striped shirt rests his right hand on his head. The man in black places his right hand horizontally under his chest and extends his left hand forward with his palm facing up. Behind them is a beige sofa, light-colored flooring, and English subtitles above that read, "We are so close to 2M family members! 😭".

[0-3] First, the woman in white runs to the right, lowers her hands to grip the sides of her pants, and smiles downward. The two men stand behind her. The man in the black and blue striped shirt peeks out from the left and makes a face. To the left of the beige sofa is a pot of green plants. A full-length mirror leans against the wall to the left of the plants. The woman in white taps her foot with her palms facing down, then raises her arms to her sides and swings her body left and right. The man in the black and blue striped shirt and the man in black lean to the left, raise their arms to their sides, make exaggerated expressions, and look forward.
